sourceMeaningMnemonic: When a <radical>yakuza</radical>'s <radical>knife</radical> <radical>boil</radical>s, you know something very <kanji>violent</kanji> and <kanji>intense</kanji> is about to happen.
meaningInfo: The yakuza member is so upset his knife boils. Right after, they will definitely get violent and intense.
readingMnemonic: When someone gets <kanji>violent</kanji> or <kanji>intense</kanji>, they always yell "<reading>Let's</reading> (<ja>れつ</ja>) get violent and intense!"
readingInfo: In the case of our mnemonic, it's a yakuza member getting violent. So, imagine a yakuza member saying "Ret's get violent!" before doing just that.
